alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 3:01PM CDT until July 01 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MARION AND NORTHWESTERN BAXTER COUNTIES... At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arkawana, or 8 miles northeast of Bull Shoals, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Price Place... Three Brothers... Oakland... Clarkridge... Norfork Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
